definition: complicated/many/in great numbers/abbr. for 繁體|繁体[fan2 ti3], traditional form of Chinese characters
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter

sentences.english: Life is a collection of experiences. Let us be your guide.
sentences.chinese: 生活是繁复体验的集锦，让我们伴您探索。

sentences.english: Complicated as it seems, English grammar has its basic rules.
sentences.chinese: 英语语法看似繁复无比，其实万变不离其宗。

sentences.english: The ornate carvings in the church are excellent works of art.
sentences.chinese: 这个教堂中繁复华丽的雕刻是非凡的艺术创作。

sentences.english: Individuality, brief luxurious, eradicates the classical serious complicated palace design.
sentences.chinese: 个性，简约奢华，破除古典厚重繁复的宫廷设计。
设计颇费心意，花样繁复，还以金粉相饰。

sentences.english: But lamination makes fabricating glass for structural uses very difficult.
sentences.chinese: 但是叠层结构使得玻璃的制造过程十分繁复。

sentences.english: There are many reasons leading to these problems and they are always hydra-headed and complex.
sentences.chinese: 导致这些问题出现的原因很多，头绪纷繁复杂。

sentences.english: They're not, you know, overwhelming like Central Park that you can get lost.
sentences.chinese: 它们不像中央公园那样纷繁复杂到你会迷路。

sentences.english: Meaningful lives are not so limited and, as we shall see, are sometimes more vexed.
sentences.chinese: 有意义的人生并非如此狭隘，有时是更为繁复的。

sentences.english: You will be amazed that such a complex harmony came from an ancient tribe.
sentences.chinese: 你会惊讶于如此繁复的合音是来自一个古老的部落。

sentences.english: The simple inlaid floor and the intricate decoration bring out the best in each other.
sentences.chinese: 脚下简洁大方的拼木地板与繁复的装饰相得益彰。

sentences.english: The third idea is to reform America’s monstrously complicated tax system.
sentences.chinese: 最后一个建议是改革美国异常繁复的税制系统。

sentences.english: The modern day life is an entangled web of complexity.
sentences.chinese: 现代化的生活如一张繁复和纠缠的网。

definition: many and complicated/mired in minor details
variant of 煩冗|烦冗[fan2 rong3]
